article_title: Dooney & Bourke Introduces Arkansas Razorback Handbags
article_text: NORTHWEST ARKANSAS (KNWA) - The newest Hog gear caters to the ladies.Leather icons Dooney and Bourke just debuted a new line of handbags and purses with collegiate logos.The items feature logos from the University of Arkansas, as well as 12 other schools: Alabama, Arkansas, Auburn, Clemson, Florida, Florida State, Georgia, LSU, Nebraska, Penn State, South Carolina, Tennessee and Texas A&M.There are eight bags in the collegiate line, ranging in price from $88 to $249. Click here to check out the bags online. You can also find them at Dillard's stores in Fayetteville & Rogers.

article_metadata.description: The leather icons have debuted a new line of handbags and purses with collegiate logos.
